name: MetricCardSeven
description: Metric card with large accent value, title, and feature list with checkmarks.

description.example: Key metrics that showcase our growth

value.note: Large metric value displayed at top of card in accent color

items.note: Array of supporting bullet points displayed with checkmarks

propsSchema.metrics: Array<{ id: string, value: string, title: string, items: string[] }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <MetricCardSeven metrics={[{ id: '1', value: '15+', title: 'Years in business consulting', items: ['8+ industries served', '5+ countries reached'] }, { id: '2', value: '500+', title: 'Projects completed', items: ['98% client satisfaction', 'Award-winning designs'] }]} title="Our Impact" description="Key metrics that showcase our growth" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
